alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 9:15AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Goshen County through 945 AM MDT... At 915 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Grange, or 30 miles south of Torrington, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Grange, Hawk Springs Recreation Area and Hawk Springs Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
